text: @allinwithchris @realDonaldTrump It certainly wasn’t their fault the got this horrible Coronavirus.  They need medical care and they need to get off the ship. Stop being such an uncaring POS. These are humans and they are American citizens. Your are their President (unfortunately). Help them!
